name: Foulbreaker
description:
FIGHT EVIL SPIRITS FOR THE GOOD OF THE KINGDOM!
Interesting locations, which are assembled by hand, are waiting for heroes who can save the fading kingdom from hordes of evil spirits! The brave king longs for salvation for all his subjects, which is why he calls the HEROES on an adventure that can end tragically...

COLLECT UNIQUE BUILDS
There are many ways to become stronger in the game, and a lot of items will help in this. Destroy monsters and raise your level, as well as collect gold, which can be spent on the development of your hero.

EXPLORE WORLDS AND DEFEAT EVIL
The world is full of dangers, every region is under the custody of great monsters... Search for boss portals and summon them to save the kingdom!
